function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Fragmented governance leading to conflicting priorities in containing virus spread","Impact":"Ineffective containment of virus spread, leading to increased cases and strain on healthcare system","Mitigation":"Establish clear protocols for coordination and communication between different levels of governance and sectors","Technologies":"Communication platforms, data sharing tools","People":"Government agencies, public health officials, local authorities","Owner":"Government agencies, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Limited local independence and high reliance on central government for coordination","Impact":"Delayed response, lack of flexibility in implementing localized containment measures","Mitigation":"Empower local authorities with decision-making authority and resources for rapid response","Technologies":"Decision support systems, forecasting tools","People":"Local authorities, community leaders","Owner":"Central government, local authorities"}]}
